segments.text: Jenny , I want to go on a picnic . Could you come too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd be glad to . I love picnicking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then , put on your casual clothes and pack some food and beverages .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I bring my camera with me ?
segments.speaker: S2
